title: 2257 Lowell Blvd -Denver -Finished Basement!
posting_body: This beautiful home is within walking distance to Sloans Lake, neighborhood restaurants and shops!
Beautiful hardwood floors throughout, fireplace, "as-is" basement surround sound with wall TV mount, a gas fireplace, and an "as-is" mini-fridge in the basement to compliment the space!
This home comes with a beautiful backyard and patio, perfect for grilling!
BEDROOMS & BATHROOMS: 4 bedrooms (3 bedrooms on upper level and 1 bedroom in basement) and 4 bathrooms (2 bathrooms upstairs, 1 full bath on main, 1 bath in basement).
KITCHEN APPLIANCES INCLUDED: Garbage disposal, refrigerator, gas stove, oven, dishwasher, microwave.
Hickory hardwood floors main living area, stairs all upstairs bedrooms and hallways.
PARKING: Two car garage and parking pass for street parking (unassigned).
BASEMENT: Finished basement with "as-is" surround sound, tv wall mount, and mini-fridge!
RESTRICTIONS:1 Dog maximum considered with a one-time non-refundable pet fee of $250 per pet.
Sorry, but we cannot allow any of the following breeds of dog: American Pit Bull Terrier, American Staffordshire Terrier, and Staffordshire Bull Terrier.
Security deposit is equal to one month's rent.
Please note we have a 700 minimum credit score for all properties.
LEASE TERM:  Initial lease to end April through June of 2023 with 12 month extensions possible at that time
Growing marijuana inside or outside the premises is not allowed, smoking of any kind inside the property is not allowed.
